claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Microsoft Corporation  (  -LSB- ˈmaɪkrəˌsɒft , _ - roʊ - , _ - ˌsɔːft -RSB- , abbreviated as MS  )  is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Redmond , Washington , that develops , manufactures , licenses , supports and sells computer software , consumer electronics and personal computers and services .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Its best known software products are the Microsoft Windows line of operating systems , Microsoft Office office suite , and Internet Explorer and Edge web browsers .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Its flagship hardware products are the Xbox video game consoles and the Microsoft Surface tablet lineup .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As of 2016 , it is the world 's largest software maker by revenue , and one of the world 's most valuable companies .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Microsoft was founded by Paul Allen and Bill Gates on April 4 , 1975 , to develop and sell BASIC interpreters for the Altair 8800 .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It rose to dominate the personal computer operating system market with MS-DOS in the mid-1980s , followed by Microsoft Windows .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The company 's 1986 initial public offering  (  IPO  )  , and subsequent rise in its share price , created three billionaires and an estimated 12,000 millionaires among Microsoft employees .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Since the 1990s , it has increasingly diversified from the operating system market and has made a number of corporate acquisitions .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In May 2011 , Microsoft acquired Skype Technologies for $ 8.5 billion , and in December 2016 bought LinkedIn for $ 26.2 billion .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: , Microsoft is market-dominant in the IBM PC-compatible operating system market and the office software suite market , although it has lost the majority of the overall operating system market to Android .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The company also produces a wide range of other software for desktops and servers , and is active in areas including Internet search  (  with Bing  )  , the video game industry  (  with the Xbox , Xbox 360 and Xbox One consoles  )  , the digital services market  (  through MSN  )  , and mobile phones  (  via the operating systems of Nokia 's former phones and Windows Phone OS  )  .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In June 2012 , Microsoft entered the personal computer production market for the first time , with the launch of the Microsoft Surface , a line of tablet computers .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: With the acquisition of Nokia 's devices and services division to form Microsoft Mobile , the company re-entered the smartphone hardware market , after its previous attempt , Microsoft Kin , which resulted from their acquisition of Danger Inc. .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The word `` Microsoft '' is a portmanteau of `` microcomputer '' and `` software '' .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Cupertino , California that designs , develops , and sells consumer electronics , computer software , and online services .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The company 's hardware products include the iPhone smartphone , the iPad tablet computer , the Mac personal computer , the iPod portable media player , the Apple Watch smartwatch , and the Apple TV digital media player .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Apple 's consumer software includes the macOS and iOS operating systems , the iTunes media player , the Safari web browser , and the iLife and iWork creativity and productivity suites .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Its online services include the iTunes Store , the iOS App Store and Mac App Store , Apple Music , and iCloud .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Apple was founded by Steve Jobs , Steve Wozniak , and Ronald Wayne in April 1976 to develop and sell personal computers .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It was incorporated as Apple Computer , Inc. in January 1977 , and sales of its computers saw significant momentum and revenue growth for the company .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Within a few years , they had hired a staff of computer designers and had a production line .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Apple went public in 1980 to instant financial success .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Over the next few years , Apple shipped new computers featuring innovative graphical user interfaces , and Apple 's marketing commercials for its products received widespread critical acclaim .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: However , the high price tag of its products and limited software titles caused problems , as did power struggles between executives at the company .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Jobs resigned from Apple and created his own company .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As the market for personal computers increased , Apple 's computers saw diminishing sales due to lower-priced products from competitors , in particular those offered with the Microsoft Windows operating system .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: More executive job shuffles happened at Apple until then-CEO Gil Amelio in 1997 decided to buy Jobs ' company to bring him back .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Jobs regained position as CEO , and began a process to rebuild Apple 's status , which included opening Apple 's own retail stores in 2001 , making numerous acquisitions of software companies to create a portfolio of software titles , and changed some of the hardware technology used in its computers .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It again saw success and returned to profitability .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In January 2007 , Jobs announced that Apple Computer , Inc. would be renamed Apple Inc. to reflect its shifted focus toward consumer electronics , and announced the iPhone , which saw critical acclaim and significant financial success .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In August 2011 , Jobs resigned as CEO due to health complications , and Tim Cook became the new CEO .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Two months later , Jobs died , marking the end of an era for the company .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Apple is the world 's largest information technology company by revenue , and the world 's second-largest mobile phone manufacturer after Samsung .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In February 2015 , Apple became the first U.S. company to be valued at over US$ 700billion .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The company employs 116,000 full-time employees and maintains 496 retail stores in 21 countries .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It operates the iTunes Store , which is the world 's largest music retailer .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: , more than one billion Apple products are actively in use worldwide .

claim: Apple Inc.'s consumer software includes Microsoft office.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The company enjoys a high level of brand loyalty and has been repeatedly ranked as the world 's most valuable brand .
